ThingDef.label: P-2 Peacemaker
ThingDef.description: "The P-2 Peacemaker pistol is your average standard-issue sidearm. It fulfills the role of a last backup in case of ammunition shortage, and fills the void of a one-handed weapon."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: P-6 Gunslinger
ThingDef.description: "Exchanges your standard Helldiver sidearm with a heavy revolver. The aptly nicknamed 'Gunslinger' revolver might seem flashy, but packs a proper punch."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: FLAM-24 Pyro
ThingDef.description: "A Helldiver compact flamer sidearm. Though it is as powerful as the FLAM-40 Incinerator, it has much shorter range and very limited ammunition. The upside is that you are always carrying a flamer for when you need to turn up the heat."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: PLAS-3 Singe
ThingDef.description: "Exchanges your standard Helldiver sidearm with a Plasma pistol. Plasma weapons fire superheated gas that explodes when it hits something. This makes them less ideal for close range but very powerful against crowds."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: AR-19 Liberator
ThingDef.description: "Fully automatic assault rifle. Reliable and powerful, it is good for dealing with most threats."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: AR-22C Patriot
ThingDef.description: "A carbine version of the AR-19 Liberator, it has a slightly extended magazine and much higher fire rate. Seldom used since the ammunition expenditure is higher than any other Helldiver weapon."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: AR-20L Justice
ThingDef.description: "This combat rifle was created to aid Helldivers in battle when they need a higher caliber rifle. The magazine carries fewer rounds than the Liberator assault rifle but each round is of a higher caliber, effective against medium armored targets."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: AR-14D Paragon
ThingDef.description: "The AR-14D Paragon is in reality an old assault rifle rarely seen in use amongst the armed forces. It uses the same cartridge as the AR-20L Justice but in a heavier, semi-automatic rifle. The rifle has been modernized and is capable of firing a poison-laced round causing targets hit to spasm and slow."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: MG-105 Stalwart
ThingDef.description: "The MG-105 is a light machinegun filling the role of fire support without being as heavy as an MG-94. Due to its lighter weight, the spread is quite wide, but the weapon is easily controlled once the user settles into the recoil."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: SG-225 Breaker
ThingDef.description: "A reliable, low-maintenance, automatic shotgun. Perfect for quickly taking out unarmoured targets and handy for close encounters."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: SG-8 Punisher
ThingDef.description: "The first shotgun used by the Helldivers is still in action by certain groups of soldiers. It has a low spread that can deal massive damage to single targets. A quirk compared to other weapons is that each shell has to be loaded manually as it has an internal magazine."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: SMG-45 Defender
ThingDef.description: "A low calibre, rapid fire weapon that is compact and easy to handle."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: MP-98 Knight SMG
ThingDef.description: "Among the highest rate of fire in the arsenal, this weapon is often used by the defence ministry on Super Earth for rapidly incapacitating groups of wrong-thinkers."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: SMG-34 Ninja
ThingDef.description: "A silenced, compact, automatic weapon, the SMG-34 is slightly higher calibre than other weapons of similar type. It uses the same type of magazines as other SMGs, but due to the higher calibre, they only hold 30 rounds. The SMG-34 is commonly seen among Commandos."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: LHO-63 Camper
ThingDef.description: "This high calibre, semi-automatic, marksman rifle is great for taking out larger targets with a few well-placed shots. The LHO-63 commonly seen among Ranger's equipment."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: RX-1 Railgun
ThingDef.description: "High powered weapon effective vs. armored enemies, fires super charged armor piercing ammunition."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: M2016 Constitution
ThingDef.description: "The M2016 'Constitution' is a reproduction of the old M1903 service rifle used in ancient times. It is fairly ineffective in combat but is used within the Super Earth Armed Forces as a ceremonial rifle. Every citizen is issued one once they turn 16 to encourage service."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: CR-9 Suppressor
ThingDef.description: "This semi/full-auto rifle fires miniature, rocket-assisted, fin-stabilized, fragmentation grenades. It's great for suppressing large crowds and taking out lightly armored targets. The CR-9 is commonly seen in a Defender's equipment kit."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: PLAS-1 Scorcher
ThingDef.description: "The PLAS-1 Scorcher is the first ever Helldiver-issued plasma weapon. Super Earth engineers have gone to great lengths to provide a safe and reliable weapon, and the result is a rifle firing bolts of superheated gas. The bolts explode on impact and can cause great anti-personnel damage."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: LAS-5 Scythe
ThingDef.description: "This continuous beam weapon consumes no conventional ammunition, however it needs to be loaded with heat dump canisters to fire."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: LAS-16 Sickle
ThingDef.description: "This carbine is based on laser technology but modified in an attempt to get something more similar to a conventional assault rifle. It fires short laser bursts and builds up heat more quickly than the LAS-5 Scythe. The trade off is higher burst damage but a shorter firing time."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: LAS-12 Tanto
ThingDef.description: ""This is an attempt to pack a laser into a small enough housing to be used for the same applications as conventional submachineguns. The result is a laser with a fixed focus step, allowing for high power at a very limited range. It was never widely used as the range limitation was considered too much of a drawback."\n- Armory Description

ThingDef.label: ARC-5 Arc Shotgun
ThingDef.description: "The AC-5 uses the same charge building setup as the AC-3 but instead of discharging at a specific target, it tries to saturate an area in front of the user with electricity. This application has limited range, but the damage output is enough to completely fry light and medium targets."\n- Armory Description
